name: 2NIB - A 2D platformer by Oli.R
description:
2NIB is a simple platformer made in the Godot game engine in which you control a rectangle through various levels and obsticles  to reach the end

game by Oli.r(Bluehighlighter)

music by Nihilore(http://www.nihilore.com/)

This is my first game so feel free to criticize it
